entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
